channel.title: Caffeine and Lasers - Notes!
channel.description: Thoughts and Links from Caffeine and Lasers

item.title: A great excerpt from the happiness of dogs
item.description: The following is a paraphrased exerpt from Mark Rowland's book "The Happiness of Dogs". I haven't finished it yet, but even from chapter one I would reccomend it.

item.title: Update on 3D Printing My PhD
item.description: As promised, I printed it in transparent PETG.... And it looked terrible. Somehow the internal support is more visible than the holes I was trying to show, which instead got clogged up.

item.title: Two Click Obsidian To the Web Automation
item.description: Here is a quick write up for method I threw together for getting my writing out of Obsidian and into my website.

item.title: 3D Printing For Better Science Communication
item.description: Reporting progress on a 3D visualisation to assist in my science communication.

item.title: On Observing Time
item.description: Sharing another link to another neat site

item.title: Crystal Lattice Structure of Popcorn
item.description: Future IgNobel Prize Winning Research Opportunity

item.title: Commands In LLMs
item.description: I wanted to share a blogpost by [dbreunig](https://www.dbreunig.com) which mirrors a desire I have in the develkopment of LLM tech. [The Post](https://www.dbreunig.com/2025/05/06/you-got-commands-in-my-prompt.html). In short, we need to introduce more *slash* commands.

item.title: Minor Reddit RSS Feed Updates
item.description: I added an extra feature to the reddit RSS feed generator to allow users to choose what timeframe to extract top posts for.

item.title: Reddit RSS Feed Generator
item.description: Yes I am aware of the wild shift in tone. I am angry that I **have** to use reddit, I still don't like it. Here is a tool to get it into your RSS reader. [Check it out](/reddit-rss.html)

item.title: Podcast is the best medium for horror fiction.
item.description: Just raving about a couple audio-ficiton podcasts I have been listening to.

item.title: Fixed my feeds. Again.
item.description: Whoops, thought I fixed my RSS feeds [last week](https://caffeineandlasers.com/notes/20250417_AddingExtraFeeds.html), Turns out I just broke it again in a new way. This time, they should be working. I think.

item.title: Technofeudalism in 4 comic panels
item.description: I tried to compress Yannis Varoufakis "Technofeudalism - What Killed Capitalism" into 4 poorly drawn comic panels
